modules.name: Introduction to Legal Skills
modules.description: Covers the basics of legal study, research methods, and academic writing. Focuses on building skills in critical thinking and legal referencing.

modules.name: English Legal System
modules.description: Explores the structure of courts, roles of judges and lawyers, sources of law, and key legal institutions.

modules.name: Introduction to Contract Law
modules.description: Provides a basic understanding of contract formation, terms, and breach.

modules.name: Contract Law
modules.description: Detailed study of contract formation, terms, misrepresentation, duress, and remedies.

modules.name: Tort Law
modules.description: Covers negligence, duty of care, causation, and liability for psychiatric harm, nuisance, and occupiers’ liability.

modules.name: UK Constitutional Law
modules.description: Examines parliamentary sovereignty, separation of powers, rule of law, and judicial review.

modules.name: EU Law
modules.description: Introduces EU institutions, legislation, supremacy, and direct effect.

modules.name: Legal Skills
modules.description: Training in legal research, mooting, legal writing, and citation using OSCOLA.

modules.name: Land Law
modules.description: Focuses on ownership, interests in land, co-ownership, leases, mortgages, easements, and covenants.

modules.name: Equity and Trusts
modules.description: Covers the nature of equity, fiduciary duties, charitable trusts, resulting and constructive trusts.

modules.name: Criminal Law
modules.description: Examines actus reus, mens rea, defences, and specific offences like homicide and theft.

modules.name: Administrative Law
modules.description: Judicial review procedures, human rights in administrative decisions, and public body accountability.

modules.name: Company Law
modules.description: Study of company formation, directors’ duties, shareholder rights, and insolvency.

modules.name: Commercial Law
modules.description: Covers sale of goods, agency, and secured transactions.

modules.name: Optional Dissertation
modules.description: Research-based project on an approved topic in law.

modules.name: Optional Specialist Modules
modules.description: Examples: International Law, Human Rights Law, Employment Law, Family Law, Intellectual Property Law.
